name: Fruit Candy Bomb
description:
Swap to match 3 or more and create waves of excitement in this fun and juicy puzzle game.
Immerse yourself into this nutritious Fruit Candy Bomb where garden strawberry, green apple, fresh blueberry, sweet carrots and delicious grapes are everywhere. Bomb your way out and start swatting right away!!

Game Features:
✔ 240 levels of insane fruit bombing fun
✔ Whip your way through Tart Citadel, Juicy Pharos, Citrus Island and Nashi Forest, ect.
✔ Collect water drops and sunflowers for the tough levels
✔ Uniquely challenging barriers
✔ High Definition & First Class Fruits Design
✔ Fun to play, even more fun to fully master
✔ Keep updating new exciting levels and surprises
